import React from 'react'; import styles from './socialProfileStyles.module.css'; const Profile = ({ avatar, name, tag, location, followers, views, likes }) => (

{name}

{tag}

{location}

  • Followers {followers}
  • Views {views}
  • Likes {likes}
); export default Profile;
